title: How to copy a a folder in File/Images to my camera roll on PIxel 4a 5g
content: I have some photo files from my Samsung SD card that have been copied to File/Images on my new PIxel, but I want to move those images to the rest of my camera roll. How do I do this? Primarily as I still want to continue to add photos to these albums and be able to find them all in one place (Camera Roll)
